How to Play

Rotate the Cube: Click and drag anywhere on the background to rotate the entire cube.

Rotate a Layer: Click and drag on a cube piece to rotate its layer. The direction of your drag determines the rotation axis.

Start Game: Double-tap the cube on the main screen to start a new scrambled game.

Buttons: Use the buttons to access settings, view stats, shuffle the cube, or undo your last move.
